name: get-templates
description: Helm plugin to get templates for a release. E.g. get templates RELEASENAME [--revision N]

scripts.pkg: npx tsc && npm run pkg-win && npm run pkg-linux
scripts.postpkg: shx mkdir -p helm-get-templates-windows-amd64/get-templates && shx mkdir -p helm-get-templates-linux-amd64/get-templates && shx cp plugin.yaml LICENSE README.md helm-get-templates-windows-amd64/get-templates && shx cp plugin.yaml LICENSE README.md helm-get-templates-linux-amd64/get-templates

author: Sandip Chitale <sandipchitale@gmail.com>
